titleStmt.title: Errour non-plust, or, Dr. Stillingfleet shown to be the man of no principles with an essay how discourses concerning Catholick grounds bear the highest evidence.
titleStmt.author: Sergeant, John, 1622-1707.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Attributed to John Sergeant. cf. NUC pre-1956.
In answer to Stillingfleet's "Faith of Protestants reduced to principles".
